content:
Pethgomo-mochanamaachaaryarkkekuka-haale......
Shreshdhamathaam thanurakthangalle mochanamezhuvaan
Paavanabalipi kaikalli-laaghoshichavaraayu
Dayaraadevaalayamivayil-shushrooshicho-
Raachaaryanmaar shemmaashanmaarennivarudeyaa-
Kadabhaaram-thirumeyyaal neekki
Pokkaname--paapam rudhiratthaal
Paadeedum naathhaa! Sthuthiye nnavar ninvalabhaage.

Aachaaryathvam munnirtthi-shleeharil mumpan
Sheemonodu naathhan chonno-ri naadam hrdyam
Ninne grhanaayakanaakki-tthanneedunne-
Nambaradharani bandhanamukthi-tthaakkolukall, nee
Bandhichaal-nyaanum bandhikkum
Mochichaal mochikkum nyaanum
Paapikalle prathiyabhyarththhichennaal ketteedum

Aachaaryanmaarkkaashvaasam nalkenam naathhaa!
Siddhanmaarodoppam nithyavaasam thannil

Aachaaryaalangkaarattheppaathaallam pokki
Shemmaashshanmaar thanmaahaantyam paade neekki
Sabhayin thozhar paathaallatthil mannaayu poyi
Innaall veenaanaadam poyppoyu maunam poondu.

Lokam vittoraachaaryanmaar ninnodoppam
Saaghosham nee vanneedumpoll modikkenam
Vaangippoyor sodaragurunaathhanmaare nee
Paavanavyande pantiyiruttheeduka nin raajye

Aachaaryeshaa! Mashihaa! Koodaashakallarppicho-
Raachaaryanmaarkkekuka poonyam naathhaa! Sthothram.
